products.en-introduction: Hello, this is HaeDam_bricks. The work I will introduce is â€œUltimate Cute Series: Three Star Wars Spaceships.â€ The Millennium Falcon, the mascot spaceship of the Star Wars franchise. The Imperial Star Destroyer, a ship that symbolizes the Imperial Army. I created the â€˜Venator-class Republic Attack Cruiser,â€™ the largest cruiser of the Republic. These three spaceships are models that have been officially released as part of the LEGO UCS series. They are incredibly expensive products, costing nearly 800,000 won, so they are not something you can just casually purchase without a lot of consideration. Given their size, which matches their price, securing display space is also a significant challenge. For those who cannot afford to purchase them due to their price and space requirements, I present my own UCS series, which is significantly smaller in both size and price! LEGO's official UCS stands for â€œUltimate Collector Series,â€ a name given to products targeting adult fans. However, my UCS is the â€œUltimate Cute Series.â€ It's a micro-sized UCS series prepared for those who can't afford the official UCS. The number of parts, price, and size of these works are all micro-sized, nearly 1/50th the size of the official products! I didn't skimp on the details either. The overall exterior design of each model is identical to the original. I packed as many details as possible into the small size. I also used some special printed parts to further maximize the details! Additionally, by removing specific parts from each model, you can see the interior of the small-scale model. Furthermore, a premium black display stand is included to showcase the mini-figures, maximizing the display effect. The cost to produce all three pieces is just 20% of the price of a single official LEGO UCS product. We hope many people will enjoy the small yet perfect â€œUltimate Cute Series.â€ This was HaeDam_bricks.

products.en-introduction: I created a miniature version of the Nike Air Jordan 1 Chicago. It took 689 LEGO bricks to recreate the Nike Air Jordan 1 Chicago. I also created the Nike Air Jordan 1 Chicago's signature. @vinjas_ Thank you for following me. If you have any questions, please DM me.
